column4: is it possible to get stuck in a loop of running the update manager to from 7.10 to 8.x? I've already run it once and it's running again for a partial update.   http://www.papernapkin.org/pastebin/view/1398/
can you run sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get dist-upgrade and post the terminal output to pastebin?
the update manager is running right now, but I wlll.  thanks.  anything else?
just that for now. we're looking for what isn't resolving or being met to allow a complete upgrade
